00051 class ANN_W : public nnBase<Point, Dim, NumType>

00078 
00079 template<typename Point, unsigned int Dim, typename NumType>
00080 ANN_W<Point, Dim, NumType>::ANN_W(Point *P, long int N)
00081 {
00082   points.resize(N);
00083   PA = annAllocPts(N, Point::__DIM);
00084   for(long int i=0;i < N;++i)
00085     {
00086       points[i] = &(P[i]);
00087       for(unsigned long int j=0;j < Point::__DIM;++j)
00088         PA[i][j] = (float) P[i][j];
00089     }
00090         
00091   Tree = new ANNkd_tree(PA, N, Point::__DIM);
00092 }
00093 
00094 template<typename Point, unsigned int Dim, typename NumType>
00095 ANN_W<Point, Dim, NumType>::~ANN_W()
00096 {
00097   delete Tree;
00098 }
00099 template<typename Point, unsigned int Dim, typename NumType>
00100 void ANN_W<Point, Dim, NumType>::ksearch(Point q, unsigned int k, 
00101                            std::vector<long unsigned int> &nn_idx,
00102                            float eps)
00103 {
00104   std::vector<double> dist;
00105   ksearch(q,k,nn_idx, dist, eps);
00106 }
00107 template<typename Point, unsigned int Dim, typename NumType>
00108 void ANN_W<Point, Dim, NumType>::ksearch(Point q, unsigned int k, 
00109                            std::vector<long unsigned int> &nn_idx,
00110                            std::vector<double> &dist, float eps)
00111 {
00112   ANNpoint query = new ANNcoord[Point::__DIM];
00113   ANNidxArray NN_idx = new int[k];
00114   ANNdistArray Curr_dist = new ANNdist[k];
00115         
00116   for(unsigned long int i=0;i < Point::__DIM;++i)
00117     query[i] = (float)q[i];
00118                 
00119   Tree->annPkSearch(query, k, NN_idx, Curr_dist, eps);
00120         
00121   nn_idx.resize(k);
00122   dist.resize(k);
00123   for(unsigned int i=0;i < k;++i)
00124     {
00125       nn_idx[i] = NN_idx[i];
00126       dist[i] = Curr_dist[i];
00127     }
00128   delete query;
00129   delete NN_idx;
00130   delete Curr_dist;
00131 }
